title: "NYC Resturant Inspection Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
    theme: flatly
---

```{r, include=FALSE, echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

# Load Libraries
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(flexdashboard)

# Load and clean dataset
nyc_resturants <- rest_inspec |>
  clean_names() |>
  mutate(
    inspection_date = mdy(inspection_date),
    grade = factor(grade, levels = c("A", "B", "C", "P", "Z", "Not Yet Graded"))
  )

# View Dataset
head(rest_inspec)
colnames(rest_inspec)

```
